feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2020-12-20: v. 7.9.24 is available
entry.content: v. 7.9.24 is available. Fixed 3 bugs. See revision history: https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history
entry.summary: v. 7.9.24 is available. Fixed 3 bugs. See revision history: https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history

entry.title: 2020-07-10: v. 7.9.15 is available
entry.content: v. 7.9.15 is available. New compressed format for project files, some bugs fixed. See revision history: https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history
entry.summary: v. 7.9.15 is available. New compressed format for project files, some bugs fixed. See revision history: https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/wiki/BORIS-revision-history

entry.title: 2020-06-16: v.8 pre-release (7.9.13) is available at https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/releases/tag/v7.9.13
entry.content: I need your help to improve the BORIS stability. If you experimented a crash please report the log file! For details see the information on the release page. Thank you for your collaboration!
entry.summary: I need your help to improve the BORIS stability. If you experimented a crash please report the log file! For details see the information on the release page. Thank you for your collaboration!
